metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4134 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in openstack-glance. This issue could allow a remote, authenticated attacker to tamper with images, compromising the integrity of virtual machines created using these modified images.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> as of 2022-11-29, there is no software fix for this issue, the recommended best practices to mitigate the issue is listed in the upstream OSSN. Marking CVE as deferred.

criterions.comment: glance: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
